issue.title: Catalog notifications should be optionnal
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Catalog notifications should be optionnal.
('Affected to an editor' and 'validated -> ready to publish')

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

TC has validated that all *catalog* notifications must be optionnal. This is not about other components.

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

rev 9384 !!! Wrong label in SVN (my branch)
